a22.l: select processname from axprocessdefv2 a group by processname order by 1
select taskname,indexno,transid from axprocessdefv2 where processname= :processname and stransid!='pgv2c' order by 1

select cast(cnd as varchar(100)) cnd,flg,0 ord from (select 'Initiator'cnd,1 flg FROM dual union all select 'Sender',2 flg FROM dual union all select 'Reporting manager',3 FROM dual union all select 'Skip level',3 FROM dual union all select 'Process owner',4 FROM dual union all select 'All users in this process',5 flg FROM dual union all select 'From field',6 flg FROM dual union all select 'Task params',7 flg FROM dual union all select 'Task list',8 flg FROM dual union all select 'Role',8 flg FROM dual union all select 'Actor',8 flg FROM dual union all select 'Others',8 flg FROM dual)a order by flg
select cast(caption||'-('||fname||')' as varchar(500)) fldcaption,fname from axpflds where tstruct=:ttransid and :notifyto like '%From field%' order by 1

fromfieldcaption.a14: iif(StringPOS({From field},nofityto)#-1 & ISEmpty(fromfieldcaption)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select groupname from axusergroups where :notifyto like '%Role%' order by 1

roles.a14: iif(StringPOS({Role},nofityto) # -1 & ISEmpty(roles)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 union all select actorname,2 ord from (SELECT distinct TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(sprocessname, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) process,ACTORNAME from axpdef_peg_actor WHERE acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (sprocessname,'[^~,+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a where process = :processname)a

actors.a14: iif(StringPOS({Actor},nofityto)#-1 & ISEmpty(actors)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select DISTINCT b.caption||'-'||TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno and :notifyto like '%Task params%' CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL order by 1

taskparams.a14: iif(StringPOS({Task params},nofityto)#-1 & ISEmpty(taskparams)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select taskname,axprocessdefv2id from axprocessdefv2 where processname = :processname and indexno < :indexno and :notifyto like '%Task list%' order by indexno

tasklist.a14: iif(StringPOS({Task list},nofityto)#-1 & ISEmpty(tasklist)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

notifyval.a14: iif(EnableEmail={No} & EnableSMS={No} & EnableWhatsapp={No},{ Select mode of notification},{T})

a22.l: select caption from axfastlink where transid = :ttransid order by caption

EmailText.a14: iif(EnableEmail={Yes} & ISEmpty(EmailText)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})
